name: Galaxy Forces VR
description:
A single player space shooter game. You are in control of a ship and the goal is to race against the clock to get the fastest time (race), or transport cargo to get the best score (mission). All done in a narrow space cave filled with enemies. Featuring interactive music, realistic physics and challenging game-play.

There are 55 levels and players may have their best score for each level sent to the game website and the top players are displayed there along with their ranking. The replay of the record scores are possible to view from the game for others to see how it was done. There are also 21 achievements to unlock.
